website_summaries.verdict: An intermediate trumpet that is both beautiful and durable.
pros: Rose brass lead pipe enables the trumpet to produce a variety of tones
Versatile piston valves extend the trumpet's lifespan
Adjustable third trigger improves playing position
Comes with carrying case and cleaning kit
cons: Some quality issues with the case

customer_reviews.title: I've been searching for a reasonably priced trumpet with good build and sound quality for ages and luckily
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently taking a conducting course and as we regularly train with an ad-hoc-orchestra where we also help to play while not conducting, I've picked up playing the trumpet again after about 8 years of pause. I've been searching for a reasonably priced trumpet with good build and sound quality for ages and luckily, Jean Paul was recommended to me. I am very happy with my new trumpet, it arrived in immaculate condition with all the necessary accessories (albeit, the white gloves are not really needed) and it's been a real treat to play on this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and Mad
customer_reviews.text: On the first one, the second valve stud dropped off in several weeks and we had to get a replacement. Then, the valve pearls of the replacement fell off in our first week and the spring on the second valve unscrewed and we had to get it fixed. Then, it is hard to produce high notes. We tried on a different trumpet, it was easy to produce those high notes. What's more the case's handle also broke in just several months.
customer_reviews.author: PEIHUA ZHU

customer_reviews.title: Used trumpet
customer_reviews.text: while I was impressed with a new? trumpet I then noticed a few QC Issues... The trumpet a chipped gold lacquer around the left hand thumb rest.. the third valve seemed a bit stiff at first and the it would stick several time before returning to position. I immediately reported to Amazon and had a replacement ordered.
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: 1 year parts and labor warranty
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing the trumpet since the 5th grade and he is now in 8th and has registered for the high school concert band/ marching band for his freshman year. He needed a new trumpet for this next phase of band and after a lot of research and all of the positive reviews we bought the Jean Paul USA TR-430. WOW! the sound quality is terrific, my son loves it. And I love the fact that it comes with a 1 year parts and labor warranty. Win, win!
customer_reviews.author: lg_user

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Tone
customer_reviews.text: A fire burned down the band room of our grandchild’s high school, and we were informed, at the time, that all instruments were a total loss. We purchased this trumpet, after extensive research, and hoped our grandchild would enjoy this as much as his “step up” trumpet that was lost. The tone is every bit as good as his other trumpet, and he is so pleased. Valves, etc, function smoothly, and our grandchild is thrilled. Also, it is about $2,000 less expensive than his previous trumpet, but look, sounds and plays as well as his first. Excellent instrument, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MusicMom

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Instrument is awesome, I purchased this for my daughter for high school band and she loves it. The sound is comparable to any other trumpet she has tried. I had to replace the pads on it because the original ones didn't hold up very long but for the money it was worth every penny. I also have a yamaha trumpet for her but she would rather use this one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A New Hobby
customer_reviews.text: I’m 66 this year. The other day I thought, “I think I will learn to play the trumpet.” I’m self taught on the guitar so why not learn a brass instrument? I researched trumpets in the $400-$500 range. I didn’t want the cheapest, but neither did I want to spend too much on my first trumpet. Jean Paul won. The trumpet is VERY nice and I am pleased. After three days I’m playing three notes relatively clearly. By a year from now I plan on be “good.” Thanks again Jean Paul. My recommendation, buy this trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: R. Feenstra

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service from Jean Paul USA!
customer_reviews.text: My son is new to trumpet and I ordered this one based on the reviews. It came quickly in great condition. He is just practicing with the mouthpiece so I can let you know in the future if he can make music! The case is excellent and very light. It has two straps so it can be worn as a backpack or over the shoulder. The clips on one of the straps broke after the second use. I emailed Jean Paul and they replied within hours that they are sending me new straps. I really appreciate companies that provide outstanding service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: E. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Daily practice time is up!
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet came recommended to us for our middle school student who’s now in his third year of band. Once he started playing it, we knew right away it was a better trumpet than the one we’d been renting. He even likes the carry case since he has a lot to carry on the bus every morning. All in all, we couldn’t be happier with his new trumpet and believe it will help make him a more dedicated musician... so far, his daily practice time is up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet for great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing trumpet for the money. I got it for my son in the 7th-grade band, and he has used it for two years now. It sounds as good as the much more expensive trumpet we rented his first year of band, and he likes it even more. The only problem we have had with it is that the case has worn out pretty quickly. That was not a problem though, as we reached out to the Jean-Paul customer service team and they responded immediately. They are going to replace the trumpet case at no charge almost two years later. I recommend this trumpet and this company for their great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Great intermediate trumpet. The sound is great. Bought for our son after about 6 months of renting. Totally different/ better sound than a rental. Would recommend for a strong ( good lung capacity) player because it does take more air to get the quality sound. Great trumpet for the price. Don't waste your money renting....
customer_reviews.author: Lazarpage

customer_reviews.title: Best trumpet for those not looking to spend a lot of money.
customer_reviews.text: Slight resistance in the horn, bought it to use in my marching band, otherwise, very beautifully crafted and and made for its price. The fabric the valve caps come onto is cheap and is begging to wear out after a month of use, but isnt too much of an issue. It's a great begginer or marching band horn, but by no means a long term permanent instrument, intonation in the upper register is easily flat but any experienced student can adjust to it and tune themselves as its played.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade trumpet with support team addressing unusual issue
customer_reviews.text: Trumpet is upgrade from student model we have been renting for 6 years. Didn’t want to invest a lot since it’s used for marching band. However, my son took trumpet out brand new and played for less than 5 minutes and two covers fell off of finger pads. I super glued them and they lasted longer than original manufactured parts and has survived 7 days at band camp EXCEPT the one cover fell off again. After contacting customer suppprt, Josh immediately offered to rectify the issue as it’s reported as an unusual occurrence. We are overall pleased with our purchase and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trumpet for my grandson. He used my Olds trumpet and was told he would get a new one once he was in High School. I bought him the Jean Paul Trumpet and it was a great buy. Sounds nice and other kids that have more expensive trumpets played his and like the sound quality better than theirs. The lyre screw fell out and got lost, no fault of the trumpet. I emailed them just to find out where I could get a replacement and they sent me a new one free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Force

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I got a Jean Paul TR 430, but when it arrived the third valve had some issues. The instrument was in good condition otherwise. I contacted Customer Service and explained the problem. They listened and quickly decided the best option was to exchange it for another one. The new one arrived and has been working great. They are sturdy instruments that look great and have good sound. The tuning is great in the middle register and so far I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiah Conrad

customer_reviews.title: great instrument, plays weill
customer_reviews.text: I just recently started to play, but, i did show this instrument to a friend of mine, who is also teaching me how to play. He is the owner of a music school, has his own band, is the director of a choir, and orchestra. has graduated from a conservatoire in Florence italy. he said that it had good sound, and quality build. Naturally he played it, and as noted was pleased with the trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Jean Paul trumpet a good value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been playing this trumpet for about 5 months now. I have enjoyed the instrument—it looks and sounds good. The pistons operate well with minimal oiling. Good price, too. The only complaint is that one of the piston buttons fell off when it was two weeks old. I reattached it with super glue and it has stayed on since then.
customer_reviews.author: JDT44

customer_reviews.title: ... and it comes with a 1 year warranty and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: So far the instrument is holding up well and it comes with a 1 year warranty and excellent customer service. This is a Chinese manufactured horn but with good U.S. quality control. I would recommend it to someone looking for a brand new horn for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be a much better trumpet than the TR-330. So far my grandson and his teacher are much happier with it than the TR-330 i bought a few months ago. I will update later. I lowered my rating because of the $190 i spent on the 330 appears to have been wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was going to rent a trumpet for my daughter who's never played, but when I saw the prices on Amazon I bought instead. Our music teacher recommended staying clear of the really cheap ones, but said the Jean Paul was a good horn. He was right. One of the valves was slow at first, but a little valve oil and playing fixed that. Looks great and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Dell'Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from a beginner trumpet.
customer_reviews.text: We got this as an upgrade to my sons beginner trumpet and its met all expectations. Several months in its handled breakdown and cleaning very well and the case holds up to the daily walk to school. He says its naturally somewhat slippery so minimal lubrication has been needed. All around a great purchase! It's a great upgrade without dipping into the 1k+ range for a trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: A great trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Our son had wanted to learn the trumpet, so after buying a cheap student trumpet he began lessons. After two years and a lot of progress we decided to upgrade to a good trumpet that would sound good and last. I think we found the right trumpet. It looks good, sounds good, and looks like it is built solid, so we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: wickshome

customer_reviews.title: Great Tone
customer_reviews.text: Supplementing an existing trumpet for travel purposes. Turns out the Jean Paul trumpet has a richer tone and the valve action is great :)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, value, and customer service
customer_reviews.text: It is for my daughter as she is just starting band this year. Everything was in good condition and nothing damaged from what I could tell. It was delivered on day it was suppose to arrive. She loves it and is playing it all the time!. She even mentioned that she likes the case because it isn't so heavy as some of her friends who have a trumpet's cases are heavier. So far very pleased with everything. A question I had with registration was responded to within 24 hours. Again overall very well pleased with everything up to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: This upgrade over the TR-330, features an adjustable 3rd valve ring for more comfortable holding position and monel valves that provide super smooth action and enhanced longevity. Inclinded Audio provides one year support for manufacturer defects. Ordering and shipping processes were easy and efficient. If you need intermediate-advanced performance from your trumpet, the TR-430 is the correct choice.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Morgan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Im a beginner trumpet player, although a professional guitar player. I took some trumpet lessons and rented a trumpet from them, then exchanged that for a better one. After that I bought one from amazon and return it because the valves didn't operate smoothly. This one is way easier to play more octaves and the valves are working great and I haven't even lubed them up yet. So far I am really impressed by this trumpet for the money, I prefer it to the one I had that cost $700+
customer_reviews.author: tdcaudio

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service...ever!
customer_reviews.text: We received a perfectly working and well sounding TR430 Jean Paul Trumpet for my youngest son. After a few weeks of playing the 1st valve seemed to be sticking, now and then. Sending a quick email to JP Customer Service resulted in James sending us a brand new trumpet within 24 hours - simply because they are the best and since our son had a performance to attend and was in need of the trumpet. Guys, the team at Jean Paul is really at the top of their game....keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: Carsten Jarfelt

customer_reviews.title: It's been excellent so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my middle-school aged child. It's been excellent so far. The unit is well built, the case is sturdy yet lightweight, and best of all my son finds it easier to play than the high-priced, brand "Y" unit he had through a lease to own program at his school.
customer_reviews.author: RC748392

customer_reviews.title: No gloves but everything else is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I think the sound is very good; however, I am firstly a clarinetist. In the description it says that this trumpet comes with “gloves for handling while cleaning.” I did not receive any gloves. It did come with everything else listed: case, padded straps for the case, 7c mouthpiece, valve oil, polishing cloth, and the trumpet. The trumpet came in it’s case in a box, and it arrived with no nicks, scratches, or dents.
customer_reviews.author: Adelynn

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome instrument. It feels so good
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome instrument. It feels so good, not heavy. I don’t know how to play it but I’ll learn. I chat with the seller online and he helped me greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Nibia M. Cedeno

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s school band after I saw prices on rental instruments. His music teacher has not complained about this trumpet so I assume it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jane325

customer_reviews.title: Intermediate trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my grandson as a Christmas gift to replace his beginners trumpet. It is very well made, he likes the case that comes with it, likes the way it handles, and we are all amazed with the sound. It is terrific! We ar3 extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ulli

customer_reviews.title: Great Intermediate level trumpet
customer_reviews.text: The trumpet itself came in immaculate condition. No bumps, no scratches, and nice responsiveness on the valves. The sound quality is above a beginner level instrument and falls in alignment with the description. My son was excited to start playing it. The case is the one downside to the instrument, but he's not using the case to play music, so it's totally fine lol. Good experience so far and I'll send an update within the next 6-8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: A good Blow for your Bucks
customer_reviews.text: Played profesh years ago! last Horn was a LeBlanc which I wore out! (twice) Playing again was on my bucket list but didn't want to put out mega bucks! This Horn exceeded my expectations in craftmanship and playability!(now if I can find my lips again) Case is canvas with molded interior! some people bitch but I prefer over old style hard case with little protection inside! A lot of Horn for minimal investment!
customer_reviews.author: Don Mittan

customer_reviews.title: Porch pirates dream: Delivery box says “Trumpet” on the outside.
customer_reviews.text: I have not opened up the package yet but am reviewing the fact that the trumpet came in a package that shows that it’s a trumpet. A $350 instrument was left on my front stoop for all to see. It’s a porch pirate’s dream.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet great customer service
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to say the Trumpet was and is excellent for my teenage son who plays in high school band. Perhaps even more important is that I ran into a problem with one of the parts to the trumpet and when I called Jean Paul instraments for help; They helped. Extremely friendly representative helped me and continues to offer their assistance with what I need. Great trumpet, great customer service Thank you Gary.G
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great instrument
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about purchasing a trumpet sight unseen, or being able to try it out. But this is was a great choice, crisp clean sound, valves and slides work beautifully, the case is nice (prefer hard case) and is capable. It came with a mouthpiece, but I recommend getting one that feels comfortable to the player , all in all a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in the high school marching band. She is very pleased with the sound and playability. This is a significant upgrade from the beginner model she played previously (which is now flat as a pancake, but that's another story altogether). She was able to hit higher notes with this trumpet immediately which gave her a nice confidence boost. Highly recommended for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful trumpet. The company Jean Paul USA provides an online maintenance tutorial to help keep the trumpet in clean and tip top shape. Now I am just a noob, however, when I do get sound through, it sounds fine.
customer_reviews.author: Enigma Phi

customer_reviews.title: Great Amazing Trumpet!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My son is in middle school and this was well worth the money for a nice sounding Trumpet. His band teacher loves it, and says it sounds like a $1200.00 trumpet!! This trumpet will be with him well into college!
customer_reviews.author: jessycl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic trumpet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this trumpet! My son has only been playing the trumpet for a few weeks but the sound quality is great and it looks beautiful! Comes with a very nice case. I had a small issue with one of the straps so I called the Jean Paul customer service and they were fantastic! I highly recommend this trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Company, Extraordinary Trumpet. In love!
customer_reviews.text: This instrument is extraordinary. Absolutely beautiful in sound and appearance. If I lost this instrument, I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wooden

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I got this trumpet for my son as a Christmas present. Great product. Feels great and looks great. The top mother-pearl ornament on one of the valves was unattached so we called them and they quickly replaced the whole part. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument for the money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful instrument for the money. We didn’t expect a lot but he’ll have it for years to come! Fast shipping - perfect present!
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son is in his high school marching band and this trumpet plays much better that the one issued by the school.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Baybayan

customer_reviews.title: ... my son it replaced the rental from school works great for 6
customer_reviews.text: both it for my son it replaced the rental from school works great for 6, 7th grade students
customer_reviews.author: Octavian D. Iosup

customer_reviews.title: worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: Noble appreance,glossy.Easy to play.Ijust to have a try and easy to make a solid and euphonic sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful trumpet. I bought this for my son as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful trumpet. I bought this for my son as he transitioned into high school. It plays so nice. His band teacher was amazed at the reasonable price versus the high quality. He felt that this trumpet was equal to a trumpet that would cost 5 times as much. Great customer service as well. Josh was very helpful when it needed repair.
customer_reviews.author: richard clament

customer_reviews.title: So far so good for my ten years old daughter playing at school ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good for my ten years old daughter playing at school band. It's much better than the one rented from NEM,
customer_reviews.author: Tai

customer_reviews.title: This trumpet is awesome all around.
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet is awesome all around. Easy to play. Responsive. Gorgeous. Well made. It comes with white gloves. I've been playing it with the gloves on because i want to keep it pristine.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good trumpet for the money. It is well made and comes in a nice case. The company provides good support as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Shubird

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It's a great trumpet and sounds very good.
customer_reviews.author: EmandTj

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased! Great horn!
customer_reviews.text: My middle-schooler uses it every day. Sounds great!!!! And excited to find somethinf affordable that he could own!!!
customer_reviews.author: animalmom

customer_reviews.title: My son and his teacher were impressed. Thank you ...
customer_reviews.text: My son and his teacher were impressed. Thank you because I honestly didn't know what I was getting. Your reviews helped me figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Victouria Major

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Played when I was younger and wanted a trumpet again to play for fun. Did tons of research and choose this model. Was amazing at the quality and playability - no regrets on buying this horn!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: John Burghard

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: The trumpet is built very well and looks great as well. I find it a pleasure to play as I build up my lips after a 40 year break.
customer_reviews.author: RoZé Cirne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I'm in awe of my new baby. Its absolutely beautiful and came in perfect shape. Very nice and smooth tone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Aispuro

customer_reviews.title: Company stands behind their product, Easy to contact and responds quickly
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is thrilled with this trumpet, the sound is clear, a definite difference in his playing.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: good instrument.
customer_reviews.text: We used to rent trumpet for my son and decided to buy this, he’s happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MusicLoverboy

customer_reviews.title: This trumpet is sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful trumpet. The sound is great as well as functionality! I've played a Yamaha in high school as well as other brands, and for the money invested, this is the best deal on a top quality trumpet I've seen. I love my new Jean Paul tr-430 and I am very pleased! If you are looking to buy a great quality trumpet for an affordable price, I recommend this one. Best deal on the market in my opinion. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Decent price. Quality sound. Great support. Some part was broken within warranty period, contacted seller and got shipping label sent right away.
customer_reviews.author: Suhua Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet. My son loves the tone and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great trumpet. My son loves the tone and the quality. Band teacher said it is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Miller

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic!
customer_reviews.text: Great trumpet at a great price. Exceeded my expectations, which were pretty high from the start.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and Stellar customer service. Jean Paul all the way!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great  price and quality
customer_reviews.text: The price was great. The quality of the instrument was good with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kato0413

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and sound. The protective case is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Candy M. H. Willets

customer_reviews.title: Great student horn.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable for the price. I don’t know how long it will last but it plays nice and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument for the money
customer_reviews.text: My son had been renting a used Blessing for his first year learning the trumpet. After 9 months of renting, it would have cost about the same to purchase the used instrument as it did to buy this new Jean Paul. He loves it. He says the mouthpiece is much better and he is able to hit notes on it that he could never hit on the Blessing. The case is very nice too, nicer than it appears in the picture. Definitely a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gina DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for a beginner and intermediate. Very nice Instrutment. I wish i could give you more details. I but it for my grandson. He said his instructor approved of it.
customer_reviews.author: john joe mata

customer_reviews.title: I am a self-motivated, multi-instrumentalist interested in jazz music ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a self-motivated, multi-instrumentalist interested in jazz music. I recently began playing on a cornet. I was making a lot of progress. But my instrument got damaged in an accident. So I replaced it with this trumpet, the 430 with the 7C mouthpeice. I find it much more difficult to get my tones. I bought.some other mouthpeices, but that hasn't helped. I am practicing more rigorously, and am finally progressing again. But I miss my cornet. Next time, i will try it before i buy it.
customer_reviews.author: pauli9363

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this, came home from vacation and immediately started playing. The sound is amazing, although it's only his second year, the difference between the student instrument and this is significant, and i believe will encourage him to follow his musical passion for many years to come
customer_reviews.author: The Red Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Poor product.
customer_reviews.text: The third valve slide set screw does not make contact with the slide. There are issues with the finishing on the valve seams. This company seems to have no quality control in place. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trumpet twice now for my two girls. It is beautiful with the rose gold, silver and gold, the sound is amazing. It has a wonderful weight. I have played trumpet for half of my life and have to say I am very impressed with the quality and sound of this instrument. I am used to old hard cases, but this one comes with a soft but well constructed case. I wish this quality of instrument had been available when I started band all those years ago. I recommend this trumpet for a beginner, someone who recently picked it back up and even a professional musician. You can't beat the price and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Jean Paul USA Trumpet - Standard, Brass (TR-430)
product_meta.description: Color:BrassThe Jean Paul TR-430 Trumpet offers its users a substantial upgrade in playing experience. The rose brass lead pipe construction produces a richer and wider range of tones. With an Adjustable third trigger, the TR-430 allows for a natural hand position and proper playing technique. It's upgraded with highly durable piston valves, lengthen the life of the instrument while maximizing sound quality. With intermediate students in mind, The TR-430 Trumpet makes a great vehicle for those players looking to take their performance to the next level.
feature_bullets: The Jean Paul Trumpet is in key of Bb
Adjustable third trigger allowing for a natural hand position and proper playing technique
Highly durable piston valve lengthening the life of the instrument while maximizing sound quality
Beautiful and robust carrying case for easy and safe transportation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
